dict.acceptation: 紧张，不安；紧张气氛；[物]张力，拉力；矛盾；

sent.orig: Tension is a mutual pulling force. It can be divided into internal tension and external tension.
sent.trans: 张力是一种相互牵引力，它可以分为内部张力和外部张力。

sent.orig: The tension sensor and the transmitting instrument construct tension closed-loop control, it make the tension invariable.
sent.trans: 松紧架、角位移传感器组成张力闭环控制实现恒张力控制。

sent.orig: All four sections of tension through vector-fed motors to implement automatic tension control.
sent.trans: 所有四段压力均堵住互换矢量变频电机来达成压力被迫把持。

sent.orig: The effect of tension on arm of force was studied that: forward tension can enhance armforce.
sent.trans: 连轧过程张力是最主要的因素，研究了张力对力臂的影响规律：前张力使力臂增加。

sent.orig: Interfacial tension is the surface tension at the interface between two liquids.
sent.trans: 界面张力是两种液体之间界面上的表面张力。
